Uses of Class
xxl.core.cursors.AbstractCursor

  • Packages that use AbstractCursor 
    Package Description
    xxl.core.cursors
    The package xxl.core.cursors provides a whole algebra of cursors that extends the functionality of the classes Iterator and Enumeration.
    xxl.core.cursors.differences
    The package xxl.core.cursors.differences provides miscellaneous implementations of the difference operator on cursors.
    xxl.core.cursors.distincts
    The package xxl.core.cursors.distincts provides miscellaneous implementations of the distinct operator on cursors.
    xxl.core.cursors.groupers
    The package xxl.core.cursors.groupers provides miscellaneous implementations of the group operator on cursors.
    xxl.core.cursors.identities
    The package xxl.core.cursors.identities provides miscellaneous implementations of identity operators on cursors.
    xxl.core.cursors.intersections
    The package xxl.core.cursors.intersections provides miscellaneous implementations of the intersection operator on cursors.
    xxl.core.cursors.joins
    The package xxl.core.cursors.joins provides miscellaneous implementations of the join operator on cursors.
    xxl.core.cursors.mappers
    The package xxl.core.cursors.mappers provides miscellaneous implementations of mapping operators on cursors.
    xxl.core.cursors.sorters
    The package xxl.core.cursors.sorters provides miscellaneous implementations of sort operators on cursors.
    xxl.core.cursors.sources
    The package xxl.core.cursors.sources provides miscellaneous implementations of source operators.
    xxl.core.cursors.sources.io
    The package xxl.core.cursors.sources.io provides miscellaneous implementations of source operators that use I/O operations to retrieve their data.
    xxl.core.cursors.unions
    The package xxl.core.cursors.unions provides miscellaneous implementations of the union operator on cursors.
    xxl.core.cursors.wrappers
    The package xxl.core.cursors.wrappers provides miscellaneous implementations of wrapper classes that make an object representing an arbitrary form of iteration via the cursor interface.
    xxl.core.indexStructures
    Provides important index structures like B-trees, R-trees, M-trees and bulk-loading-algorithms.
    xxl.core.indexStructures.vLengthBPlusTree
    Experimental Package for variable length B+tree implementation.
    xxl.core.io
    Provides classes and routines for system input and output through data streams, serialization, raw i/o and a FAT file system.
    xxl.core.relational.cursors
    The package provides a whole algebra of cursors that extends the functionality of the classes cursors.
    xxl.core.spatial.cursors
    Provides mappers for different type of Point and Rectangle objects as well as several join algorithms: nested loops distance similarity-join for Points, the spatial join algorithm based on space-filling curves proposed by Jack Orenstein, similarity-join algorithm "GESS: Generic External Space Sweep" and hash-based plane sweep for two-dimensional data.
    xxl.core.spatial.geometries.cursors
    A collection of spatial queries.
    xxl.core.spatial.rectangles
    Implemetns the base type Rectangle for high-dimensional rectangle objects (hyper-cubes) and extentions for different coordinate types (double, float, long).
    xxl.core.spatial.spatialBPlusTree.cursors  

    • Uses of AbstractCursor in xxl.core.cursors

      Subclasses of AbstractCursor in xxl.core.cursors 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      class  ResetableCursor<E>
      This class provides a wrapper that enhance a cursor (or iterator) that is not resetable by a reset functionality.

    • Uses of AbstractCursor in xxl.core.cursors.differences

      Subclasses of AbstractCursor in xxl.core.cursors.differences 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      class  NestedLoopsDifference<E>
      A nested-loops implementation of the difference operator (input1 - input2).
      class  SortBasedDifference<E>
      A sort-based implementation of the difference operator (input1 - input2).

    • Uses of AbstractCursor in xxl.core.cursors.distincts

      Subclasses of AbstractCursor in xxl.core.cursors.distincts 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      class  NestedLoopsDistinct<E>
      A nested-loops implementation of the distinct operator, i.e., all duplicates contained in a cursor will be removed.
      class  SortBasedDistinct<E>
      A sort-based implementation of a distinct operator, i.e., all duplicates contained in the input cursor will be removed.

    • Uses of AbstractCursor in xxl.core.cursors.groupers

      Subclasses of AbstractCursor in xxl.core.cursors.groupers 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      class  AggregateGrouper
      An aggregate grouper provides a grouping and an aggregation in only one step.
      static class  AggregateGrouper.CFDCursor
      This class provides a cumulative frequency distribution (CFD) of given data.
      static class  AggregateGrouper.DuplicatesRemover
      This class provides a duplicate remover.
      class  DBScan
      A grouper that generates clusters from a given input iteration.
      class  HashGrouper<E>
      A hash grouper partitions input data into groups (strict evaluation).
      class  Minimator<E,M>
      The minimator is an aggregator that computes the minimal element for a given input iteration (lazy evaluation).
      class  NestedLoopsGrouper<E>
      A nested-loops implementation of the group operator, i.e., all elements of the input iteration get partitioned according to a user defined function.
      class  ReplacementSelection<E>
      The replacement-selection operator takes an iteration as its input and creates sorted runs as its output.
      class  SortBasedGrouper<E>
      A sort-based implementation of the group operator.

    • Uses of AbstractCursor in xxl.core.cursors.identities

      Subclasses of AbstractCursor in xxl.core.cursors.identities 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      class  TeeCursor<E>
      A tee-cursor provides a method to duplicate a given iteration.

    • Uses of AbstractCursor in xxl.core.cursors.intersections

      Subclasses of AbstractCursor in xxl.core.cursors.intersections 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      class  NestedLoopsIntersection<E>
      A nested-loops implementation of the intersection operator.
      class  SortBasedIntersection<E>
      A sort-based implementation of the intersection operator.

    • Uses of AbstractCursor in xxl.core.cursors.joins

      Subclasses of AbstractCursor in xxl.core.cursors.joins 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      class  NestedLoopsJoin<I,E>
      A nested-loops implementation of the join operator.
      class  SortMergeEquivalenceJoin<I,E>
      A sort-merge implementation of the equivalence-join operator (especially the equi-join).
      class  SortMergeJoin<I,E>
      A sort-merge implementation of the join operator.

    • Uses of AbstractCursor in xxl.core.cursors.mappers

      Subclasses of AbstractCursor in xxl.core.cursors.mappers 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      class  Aggregator<E,A>
      The aggregator incrementally computes one or even more aggregates for an input iteration.
      class  Mapper<I,E>
      A mapper invokes a given mapping function on an array of input iterations.
      class  ReservoirSampler
      This class shows how to make use of the reservoir-sampling function.

    • Uses of AbstractCursor in xxl.core.cursors.sorters

      Subclasses of AbstractCursor in xxl.core.cursors.sorters 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      class  MergeSorter<E>
      An external merge-sort algorithm based on the replacement-selection operator.

    • Uses of AbstractCursor in xxl.core.cursors.sources

      Subclasses of AbstractCursor in xxl.core.cursors.sources 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      class  ArrayCursor<E>
      An array-cursor constructs a cursor backed on an arbitrary object array.
      class  CollectionCursor<E>
      An collection-cursor constructs a cursor backed on an arbitrary collection.
      class  ContinuousRandomNumber
      A cursor providing a finite or infinite stream of randomly distributed double values given by the wrapped pseudo random number generator for continuous numbers.
      class  DiscreteRandomNumber
      A cursor providing a finite or finite stream of randomly distributed integer values given by the wrapped pseudo random number generator DiscreteRandomWrapper for discrete numbers.
      class  EmptyCursor<E>
      An empty cursor contains no elements, i.e., every call to its hasNext method will return false.
      class  Enumerator
      An enumerator returns an ascending or descending sequence of integer objects within an optional given range.
      class  Inductor<E>
      Given a tuple of start values (a0 to an) the inductor incrementally computes the value a(n+1+i) (i ≥ 0) by calling the function next with the parameters ai to a(n+i).
      class  Permutator
      The permutator 'returns' a permutation of a given input array or creates a permutation of integer values from 0 to n by lazy evaluation.
      class  Repeater<E>
      A repeater reiterates a given object n times.
      class  SingleObjectCursor<E>
      This class provides a cursor that returns a given object exactly one time.

    • Uses of AbstractCursor in xxl.core.cursors.sources.io

      Subclasses of AbstractCursor in xxl.core.cursors.sources.io 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      class  ChannelCursor
      This class provides a cursor backed on a channel, i.e., the cursor listens to the given channel and waits for objects send through it.
      class  FileInputCursor<E>
      This class provides a cursor that depends on a given file.
      class  FileNameCursor
      This class provides an implementation of the cursor interface that iterates over the files contained in the specified path and its subdirectories and returns their names.
      class  InputStreamCursor<E>
      This class provides an iteration that depends on a data input stream.
      class  URLInputCursor<E>
      This class provides a cursor that depends on a given URL, i.e., the data stored in a ressource specified by a given URL.
      class  ZipFileInputCursor<E>
      This class provides a cursor that reads the input from an entry of a given zip file.

    • Uses of AbstractCursor in xxl.core.cursors.unions

      Subclasses of AbstractCursor in xxl.core.cursors.unions 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      class  Flatten
      A flatten gets an input iterator which has a certain hirarchical structure and flattens this structure, so that only the interesting objects are returned.
      class  Merger<E>
      A merger serializes input iterations with respect to a given comparator or queue.
      class  Sequentializer<E>
      A sequentializer concatenates n input iterations to a single one.

    • Uses of AbstractCursor in xxl.core.cursors.wrappers

      Subclasses of AbstractCursor in xxl.core.cursors.wrappers 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      class  EnumerationCursor<E>
      This class provides a wrapper for enumerations, i.e., an emumeration can be accessed via the cursor interface.
      class  IteratorCursor<E>
      The iterator-cursor wraps an iterator to a cursor, i.e., the wrapped iterator can be accessed via the cursor interface.
      class  PostponeUpdatesCursor 
      class  QueueCursor<E>
      A queue-cursor wraps a queue to a cursor, i.e., the wrapped queue can be accessed via the cursor interface.

    • Uses of AbstractCursor in xxl.core.indexStructures

      Subclasses of AbstractCursor in xxl.core.indexStructures 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      protected class  BPlusTree.QueryCursor
      This class uses an efficient algorithm to perform queries on the BPlusTree.
      protected class  MVBTree.MVBTreeQueryCursor 
      class  MVBTree.PriorityQueryCursor
      Test Cursor
      class  QueryCursor
      This class represents lazy Cursors which can be used to perform queries on a Tree.
      class  RTree.AsymmetricTwoDimensionalSkylineQuery 
      class  RTree.SymmetricSkylineQuery 
      class  Tree.Query
      Queries on the Tree are evaluated lazily (ONC).

    • Uses of AbstractCursor in xxl.core.indexStructures.vLengthBPlusTree

      Subclasses of AbstractCursor in xxl.core.indexStructures.vLengthBPlusTree 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      protected class  VariableLengthBPlusTree.QueryCursor
      This class uses an efficient algorithm to perform queries on the BPlusTree.

    • Uses of AbstractCursor in xxl.core.io

      Subclasses of AbstractCursor in xxl.core.io 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      class  ObjectToBlockCursor
      This class transforms objects into a sequence of Blocks.

    • Uses of AbstractCursor in xxl.core.relational.cursors

      Subclasses of AbstractCursor in xxl.core.relational.cursors 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      class  CrossTableCursor<D>
      This class computes the cross table of an input metadata cursor.
      class  GroupAggregator
      The aggregator computes aggregates like SUM, COUNT and VARIANCE for a grouped input metadata cursor, i.e., an input cursor delivering groups (cursors) of input elements.
      class  InputStreamMetaDataCursor
      This class constructs a metadata cursor for a given input stream, file or URL.
      static class  Orenstein.FloatPointKPEzCodeMapper
      Static inner class mapping a tuple containg a FloatPoint to a tuple containing a KPEzCode using Mappers.pointToKPEzCodeMappingFunction(float, int).
      class  ResultSetMetaDataCursor
      This class wraps a result set to a metadata cursor.
      class  SortBasedDivision
      This class provides the division operator of the relational algebra.
      class  Union
      Union is a straight forward implementation of the operator union.

    • Uses of AbstractCursor in xxl.core.spatial.cursors

      Subclasses of AbstractCursor in xxl.core.spatial.cursors 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      class  GESS
      This class provides the similarity-join algorithm "GESS: Generic External Space Sweep" (see "[DS 01] GESS: a Scalable Algorithm for Mining Large Datasets in High Dimensional Spaces by Jens-Peter Dittrich and Bernhard Seeger, ACM SIGKDD 2001." for a detailed description of this method).
      class  IndexedNestedLoopsJoin
      A simple IndexedNestedLoopsJoin-operator: The given RTree-index processes a window query for each KPE-object of the input iterator.
      class  KPEInputCursor
      The KPEInputCursor constructs an Iterator of KPEs for a given flat File containing KPE-Objects.
      class  MSJ
      This class provides the MSJ (Multidimensional Spatial Join) similarity-join algorithm proposed by Koudas and Sevick in "[KS 98] Nick Koudas, Kenneth C.
      static class  MSJ.MSJSorter
      This class provides the I/O-strategy of MSJ
      class  Orenstein
      The spatial join algorithm based on space-filling curves proposed by Jack Orenstein.
      class  PlaneSweep
      Plane Sweep for two-dimensional data.
      class  PointInputCursor
      The PointInputCursor constructs an Iterator of Points for a given flat File of Point-Objects.
      class  RectangleInputIterator
      The RectangleInputIterator constructs an Iterator of rectangles for a given flat File of Rectangle-Objects.
      class  RectangleUniverseDouble
      The RectangleUniverseDouble computes the universe (Minimal Bounding Rectangle, MBR or MBB) for an Iterator of DoublePoints.
      class  Replicator
      The Replicator provides the replication engine of GESS.
      class  RTreeJoin
      This is one implementation of the R-Tree-Join-Algorithms proposed in [BKS 93] (see "[BKS 93] Efficient Processing of Spatial Joins by Thomas Brinkhoff, Hans-Peter Kriegel and Bernhard Seeger, ACM SIGMOD 1993." for a detailed description of this method).
      class  UniverseDouble
      The UniverseDouble computes the universe (Minimal Bounding Rectangle, MBR or MBB) for an Iterator of DoublePoints.
      class  UniverseFloat
      The UniverseFloat computes the universe (Minimal Bounding Rectangle, MBR or MBB) for an Iterator of FloatPoints.

    • Uses of AbstractCursor in xxl.core.spatial.geometries.cursors

      Subclasses of AbstractCursor in xxl.core.spatial.geometries.cursors 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      class  NearestNeighborQuery
      The NearestNeighborQuery is a priority based query which returns all neighbors of a given query object sorted by their distance to the query object.

    • Uses of AbstractCursor in xxl.core.spatial.rectangles

      Subclasses of AbstractCursor in xxl.core.spatial.rectangles 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      class  RandomRectangle
      A Cursor that returns randomly created Rectangles (of type Rectangle).

    • Uses of AbstractCursor in xxl.core.spatial.spatialBPlusTree.cursors

      Subclasses of AbstractCursor in xxl.core.spatial.spatialBPlusTree.cursors 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      class  SpatialMultiRangeCursor 
      class  SpatialRangeQueryBPlusCursor
      Iterative Cursor which relies on the implementation of the nextInBox Function.
      class  SpatialRangeQueryBPlusCursorVL
      Iterative Cursor which relies on the implementation of the nextInBox Function.
